bOverrideSize: If enabled, default size will be overridden by the corresponding property.
Size: Overrides default size of the baked out texture.
bOverrideFilter: If enabled, default filtering mode will be overridden by the corresponding property.
Filter: Overrides the default filtering mode used when sampling the baked out texture.
bOverrideTiling: If enabled, default addressing mode will be overridden by the corresponding property.
Tiling: Overrides the default addressing mode used when sampling the baked out texture.
